Name: Deep Snow Aesi

SetupTraits.Name: Suggested Battlefield
SetupTraits.Description: This legend is best fought in a battlefield that is 12x12 or a little larger.

Combo.Name: Diamond Dust
Combo.Effects: Deals 1 damage, again, for every character in the area.

Combo.Name: Crystalline Lance
Combo.Effects: Foe must save or be shoved 6

Actions.Name: Northern Winds
Actions.Description: The Aesi dashes 3. It becomes intangible and gains phasing while moving.

Actions.Name: Stiffen Limbs
Actions.Description: The Aesi chooses up to three characters in range 6. During their next turn, those characters must end their turn at least 4 spaces from their starting location at the start of their turn, or else take [D]+fray and become stunned.

Actions.Name: Freeze Solid
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 becomes shattered. At the end of that character's next turn, they must save. On a failed save, they are encased in ice, removing them from the battlefield and becoming replaced with a destructible (10 hp) height 1 frozen statue object. Until the is destroyed, they cannot take a turn. When it's destroyed, they are returned to the battlefield in the space they left and can take a turn as normal

PhasesDescription: On round 4, and every two rounds thereafter (6, 8, 10 etc), the Aesi uses Mortal Mockery.

Actions.Name: Frozen Impaler
Actions.Description: The Aesi chooses a character in range 6. At the end of that character's turn, an icicle coalesces and falls on that character for a blast 1 area effect centered on them. Characters inside take 2 damage, then create the icicle adjacent to the targeted character. The icicle is a height 2 destructible object (1o hp) that has aura 1. The aura has the following effects:

ExtraItems.Description: Foes that start their turn in the aura take 2 piercing damage.
Foes are vulnerable+ while in the aura.
